#labels Featured

== Genesis Plus core ==

 * based on the original 1.2a version by [http://cgfm2.emuviews.com/ Charles MacDonald]
 * current version (improved emulation accuracy, new features, compatibility fixes & various cores modification) by [http://gxdev.wordpress.com/ eke-eke]
 * Mame Z80 core by Juergen Buchmueller
 * Mushashi 68k core by Karl Stenerud
 * Mame YM2612 core by Jarek Burczynski
 * SN76489 core by [http://www.smspower.org/maxim/ Maxim]
 * SVP core by [http://notaz.gp2x.de/svp.php Notaz]
 * [http://www.mega-nerd.com/SRC/ libsamplerate ] by Erik de Castro Lopo
 * Blip Buffer linear interpolation & [http://www.fly.net/~ant/libs/ntsc.html NTSC Video Filter ] by Shay Green (aka Blargg)
 * EQ implementation by Neil C / Etanza Systems / 2K6
 * [http://zlib.net/ zlib] by Jean-Loup Gailly and Mark Adler_


==== additional thanks to ====
 * Nemesis, for having tested and documented many of the unknown YM2612 features and helping out improving FM emulation.
 * Tasco Deluxe for his work around the SVP chip and for his documentation of Realtec mapper used in a few unlicensed games.
 * [http://www.trzy.org/ Bart Trzynadlowski] for his documentations about the mapper used in Super Street Fighter II and 68000 undocumented behaviour
 * [http://haze.mameworld.info/ Haze] for having found and documented many unlicensed game protections
 * Notaz & Stef for their help and sharing the source code of their respective emulators, Picodrive and Gens, which were also great sources of inspiration.
 * Steve Snake, author of Kega and [http://aamirm.hacking-cult.org/ AamirM], author of Regen, for sharing some of their findings.
 * Charles Mc Donald for his excellent documentation about the Sega Genesis hardware and for having designed such a great emulator in the first place (your VDP renderer rules !)
 * [http://www.spritesmind.net/_GenDev/forum/ Spritesmind] & [http://www.smspower.org/ SMS Power] forums members for their technical help_


== Gamecube/Wii ports ==

 * based on the original Gamecube port from softdev, honkeykong & markcube
 * Wii port & current code by eke-eke
 * GUI design by lowlines & eke-eke
 * GUI engine by eke-eke
 * Memory Card icon design by [http://www.tehskeen.net brakken]
 * [http://chishm.drunkencoders.com/libfat/ libFAT] by Chism , ported to libogc by Sven Peter (svpe) & wintermute
 * [http://www.wiiuse.net/ wiiuse] library by Michael Laforest (para), ported to libogc by shagkur
 * [http://hackmii.com/2008/08/libdi-and-the-dvdx-installer/ libDI] by Erant
 * [http://www.devkitpro.org/category/libogc/ libOGC] by wintermute, shagkur, marcan & many other contributors
 * [http://www.devkitpro.org/ devkitpro] & [http://www.devkitpro.org/category/devkitppc/ devkitPPC] by wintermute
 * asndlib and OGG player by hermes
 * libpng and libtremor by various people_
